name: Managed 24/7
tagline: Milton Keynes IT support and Services Company
description: Managed 24/7 is a UK based Technology Company; our head office is located in Milton Keynes. We specialize in providing technology services and solutions to commercial and public sector organisations. Our solutions address common challenges facing today’s growing businesses; from email, web and data security through to on and off premise backup solutions.  Best of all, our 24x7 pro-active Smart Desk service means you’re never alone when problems occur.
